data.expected_result: Pressing Enter should accept the invite/the new server created and should take you to the server
data.short_description: Pressing Enter doesn't work in the new join/create a server modal
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to the "Create/Join a server"/the new join/create a server modal on the button of the server list (The + Icon) - Press either Create or Join - Enter a valid invite/new server name - Press Enter - Observe
